mapper.update: update live_score set is_resolved = #{is_resolved}, event_date = CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'年',1),'-',SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'月',1),'年',-1),'-', SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'日',1),'月',-1)), event_timestamp = CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'年',1),'-',SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'月',1),'年',-1),'-', SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'日',1),'月',-1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(event_time,'日',-1)) where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, league_name, event_time, status, home_team, score, away_team, half_score, asian_plate, size, full_details, half_time_details, page_url, is_resolved FROM live_score WHERE id = #{id}
